user_query: die and eventually the youngest girl Mei while her sister is at school runs into a beast named Totoro in the forest now Totoro has a lot of magical abilities he can make plants grow at will in fact entire trees he has a cat bus at his disposal that can basically take you anywhere that you want to go and he can fly on a spinning top is he in the girl's imagination or is he real can he actually break through the real world or is he just an imaginary friend one of my biggest fears and I mean this for real is that classic films will not be appreciated by new generations I'm afraid that some of these great classic animations are going to be tossed aside by a new generation that just wants 3D computer animation and a lot of dance sequences in their animated films and I was so refreshed and relieved to sit in this theater today surrounded by kids who were in awe at this movie normally I'm annoyed when kids get really vocal during films but here it was perfect at all the right moments kids were like wow oh look I see Totoro like they were so into it and I was so relieved to see that because this movie has none of the modern distractions of almost every kids movie that's released today there's no breathtaking action sequence there's no explosions it's not in 3D and it's not computer animated but the kids in this theater were transfixed by this movie and so was I it still works beautifully as an adult the animation is just so damn good and this movie is going to be timeless seeing it

entities.entity_description: 메이는 영화의 주인공인 어린 소녀로, 언니가 학교에 간 사이 숲에서 토토로를 만나게 된다
토토로는 숲에 사는 신비로운 존재로, 식물을 자라게 하고 고양이 버스를 부리며 팽이를 타고 날 수 있는 마법 능력을 가진 캐릭터이다
이웃집 토토로는 클래식 애니메이션 영화로, 어린 소녀가 숲에서 토토로라는 신비로운 존재를 만나는 이야기를 다룬다. 3D나 컴퓨터 애니메이션이 아닌 전통 애니메이션으로 제작되었으며 시대를 초월한 명작으로 평가받는다
고양이 버스는 토토로가 부리는 존재로, 원하는 곳 어디든 데려다줄 수 있는 능력을 가진 캐릭터이다

relationships.relationship_description: 토토로는 고양이 버스를 부릴 수 있다
고양이 버스는 이웃집 토토로에 등장하는 캐릭터이다

MY NEIGHBOR TOTORO.description: MY NEIGHBOR TOTORO -> MY NEIGHBOR TOTORO
